name: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander
description: 6'6" guard, rising superstar. Unique pace, deadly floater, Canadian cool. Plays like he's moving in slow motion but always ahead.

floater.name: Silky Floater
floater.description: Signature floater in the paint - unguardable
floater.prompt: releasing floater over bigger defender - ball floating off fingertips, body contorted but controlled, calm expression amid chaos, the softest touch in traffic

change-of-pace.name: Change of Pace
change-of-pace.prompt: mid-change-of-pace move freezing defender - shifting speeds in way that defies logic, defender caught between fast and slow, the human manipulation of time

step-back.name: Step Back Three
step-back.expression: creating his own shot, star move
step-back.prompt: executing step-back three-pointer - creating space from nothing, shooting over defender's contest, the star shot-creation that marks the elite

arms-out-shrug.name: Cold Shrug
arms-out-shrug.description: Arms out 'what do you want me to do' gesture
arms-out-shrug.prompt: arms out to sides in cold shrug - 'what can I say' gesture after another bucket, Canadian cool, unbothered by the moment

through-contact.name: Finishing Through
through-contact.description: Absorbing contact to finish at rim
through-contact.prompt: finishing at rim through heavy contact - long body absorbing hit, still completing the play, deceptive strength in slim frame

celebration-with-fans.name: OKC Love
celebration-with-fans.prompt: celebrating with Thunder fans - arms raised to crowd, smile of genuine connection, embracing Oklahoma City, rising star building something special
